entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as Harry's father and Sirius' best friend. He is described as a good person who grew out of being an idiot at the age of 15.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as James' best friend and Harry's godfather. He is trying to convince Harry that his father was a good person.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who took James on dates and jinxed him in front of his mother. He is also the subject of conversation when Lupin asks how he reacted to Harry seeing all this.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person who is having a conversation with Sirius and Lupin about James and Snape.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as someone who is part of the conversation between Harry and Sirius. He asks how Snape reacted to Harry seeing all this.

relationships.description: Sirius mentions that James was his best friend.
